stepTitle:
The $$4$$ vessels described below are equal in size and undergo the same heating process under constant pressure. Rank the value of Q for these ideal gasses from smallest to largest.

a. Vessel 1: $$2$$ mol $$H_2$$
$$b$$. Vessel 2: $$4$$ mol $$N_2$$
c. Vessel 3: $$2$$ mol He
$$d$$. Vessel 4: $$1$$ mol Ne
stepBody: Please format the answer as follows: a < $$b$$ < c < $$d$$.
